title: Flows
lede: Create intelligent automation workflows that respond to events and trigger actions.

sections.title: Flow Builder
sections.content:
Design automated workflows with visual drag-and-drop interface.

Flow Components:

  • Triggers: Events that start workflows (calls, form submissions, etc.)
  • Conditions: Logic gates to control flow path
  • Actions: Tasks performed when conditions are met
  • Integrations: Connect to external services and APIs

sections.title: Flow Management
sections.content:
Manage and monitor your automation workflows.

  • Flow Templates: Pre-built workflows for common scenarios
  • Version Control: Track changes and rollback capabilities
  • Performance Monitoring: Monitor execution times and success rates
  • Error Handling: Configure retry logic and fallback actions
